name: Forgotten Shrine
description:
Explore dungeons, wipe out enemies and discover what secrets the monument holds! 

Forgotten Shrine is a 2D Roguelike Dungeon-Crawler with a cartoonish Art Style inspired in tittles such as UnderMine, Hades and Swords of Ditto. 

Cleanse it from the darkness and find out what brought these creatures here!

Follow our Young Paladin in discovering what mysteries the dungeons bellow the once victorious Monument hold Centuries after the great battle took place our protagonist visits the now ravaged Shrine. 

Controls:
  • Move: W A S D.
  • Attack: LMB.
  • Dodge: SPACE.
